title: OnePlus 10 Pro officially launches globally today w/ promos in the US, Verizon certification
content:
The OnePlus 10 Pro was the brand’s first major release to spend months as an exclusive to the Chinese market, but as of today, it’s finally available globally. Here’s where you can buy it and what to expect.

more…

The post OnePlus 10 Pro officially launches globally today w/ promos in the US, Verizon certification appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The OnePlus 10 Pro officially releases globally today, and there are a bunch of promos running in the US for interested buyers.
